name: Starlite Aviation Training Academy (Pty) Ltd
about: Starlite Aviation Training Academy, established in 1999, is a premier aviation training institution based in South Africa, with campuses in Durban and Mossel Bay. We offer a comprehensive range of helicopter and aeroplane pilot training courses, including Private Pilot Licence, Commercial Pilot Licence, Flight Instructor Rating, and various type ratings. Our academy is renowned for its stringent aviation safety standards, high-quality ground school courses, and superior aircraft fleet. We train local and international students, as well as military and police personnel from sub-equatorial Africa. With state-of-the-art simulators and a diverse fleet, including the Robinson R66 and Guimbal Cabri G2, we provide exceptional training that meets global standards. Our commitment to safety, quality, and excellence has positioned us as a leader in aviation training.
